attributes.action: Help Save Howden House in Livingston, Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Howden house in livingston, scotland is falling apart and we need to save it from becoming rubble as it is a part of livingatons history
Please Please help save howden house
more info is avalible at http://www.gibsoni.co.uk/phpBB3/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=339&sid=5de5b43204b5334da3e99b94b5d2abfc

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority or heritage trust in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
